In the book he continues to defend the invasion, saying the Middle East would be far more perilous than it is today if Saddam Hussein were in still in power.The memoir, titled Known and Unknown and due in bookstores next week, is an 800-page account of his life and careers in government and business. Eigenaren van websites kunnen met Adsense via Google ingekochte advertenties op hun sites tonen, waarbij Google een deel van de omzet opstrijkt. Het vierde kwartaal was een geweldig einde van een topjaar. Onze prestaties werden gedreven door een snel groeiende digitale economie en de enorme interesse voor onze nieuwe activiteiten, zoals banneradvertenties en mobiel, aldus Google-topman Eric Schmidt , die aan zijn laatste kwartaal als directeur van Google is begonnen. Tegelijk met de presentatie van de kwartaalcijfers maakte Google namelijk bekend dat Eric Schmidt in april het stokje zal overdragen aan medeoprichter

Can Dance"), and Piers Morgan ( "America's Got Talent")- are more willing to play the mean judge than Americans. "You guys love casting Brits as villains," he says. It reminds you of when America was a British colony, and it enables you to perpetuate the myth that you're plucky little underdogs with right on your side. That's far more palatable than thinking of America as an overbearing, imperial power, throwing its weight around on the world stage. Do the world's worst humans make the world's best judges? Up until now, that's been the thinking behind "American Idol," home of the original mean judge Simon Cowell . Over the

Saying his "heart was in Indiana," Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.
